#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
#define mod 1000000007ll
using namespace std;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef vector<vi> vvi;
int T,n,mx,res[100005],DA[100005],db[100005];
bool visited[100005];
void dfs(vvi& adj,int u,int w)
{
	if(mx<w)mx=w;
	
	db[u]=w;
	visited[u]=1;
	for(int i=0;i<adj[u].size();i++)
	if(!visited[adj[u][i]])
	{
		dfs(adj,adj[u][i],w+1);
	}
}

int main()
{
	scanf("%d",&n);
	vvi adj(n+1,vi(0));
	for(int x,y,i=1;i<n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
		adj[x].push_back(y);
		adj[y].push_back(x);
	}
	mx=0;
	dfs(adj,0,0);
	
	
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	if(mx==db[i])
	{
		memset(visited,0,sizeof(visited));
		dfs(adj,i,0);
		for(int j=0;j<n;j++)DA[j]=db[j];
		break;
	}

	
	
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	if(mx==db[i])
	{
		memset(visited,0,sizeof(visited));
		dfs(adj,i,0);
		break;
	}
	
	int both=0,cA=0,cB=0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	if(mx==db[i]&&mx==DA[i])both++;
	else if(mx==DA[i])cA++;
	else if(mx==db[i])cB++;
	
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	if(DA[i]==db[i])
	{
		res[i]=both+cA+cB;
		if(DA[i]==mx)res[i]--;
	}
	else if(DA[i]<db[i])res[i]=both+cA;
	else res[i]=both+cB;

	for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)cout<<res[i]<<" ";
	cout<<res[n-1]<<"\n";
	return 0;
}
